defaultStatus: use !help for a list of commands.
disabledMessage: I am sorry, this command is currently disabled.
invalidChannel: Sorry, you cannot perform this command here.
invalidPermission: You do not have permission to use this command. If you believe this to be a mistake, please let an Admin know so they can try and fix it.
returnsChannel: This command will generate a reply back in the **__channel__** that it was used in.
returnsDM: This command will generate a reply back to the **__user__** that used it.
